overview:
Nikolaus Thomale is investor and COO at Luxodo.com - the leading German marketplace for shops and boutiques offering luxury goods in the area of fashion, interior and cosmetics.

Studying law at the Bucerius Law School in Hamburg (Germany) and University of Tel Aviv (Israel) Nikolaus Thomale worked for several renowned companies like the law firm Freshfields Bruckhaus Deringer, the private bank Berenberg Bank, the luxory brand Montblanc and DailyDeal, one of Europeâ€™s fastest growing startups.

Nikolaus Thomale is an entrepreneur since schooltime and founded 3 still successful companies. Among them brick and mortar businesses as well as an internet startup.
